abstract: JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup, Bank of America and Goldman Sachs hold nearly 95 percent of the industry’s total exposure to derivatives contracts, a report shows.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup, Bank of America and Goldman Sachs hold nearly 95 percent of the industry’s total exposure to derivatives contracts, a report shows.
lead_paragraph: A few select titans of Wall Street continue to dominate the banking industry’s role in derivatives trading, according to a report issued by the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency.

headline.main: 4 Wall Street Banks Still Dominate Derivatives Trade
